description: Identify the year with the highest number of shopping malls.
Determine the total number of shopping malls at the end of 1990.
Calculate the average number of shopping malls from 1986 to 2010.
Observe if there is a year with a significant drop in the number of shopping malls compared to the previous year.
Identify the range of the number of shopping malls between 1986 and 2010.
Find any clusters of years where the number of shopping malls remained relatively stable.
Determine if there is a trend in the number of shopping malls over the years.
Which years have fewer than 60,000 shopping malls?
Rank the years from the highest to the lowest number of shopping malls.
What percentage of the years have more than 70,000 shopping malls?
